game.title: The Missing Scroll
game.objective: Retrieve the missing scroll from the catacombs.
game.description: The ancient scroll of knowledge has been stolen and hidden in the catacombs. Retrieve it and bring it back to the temple.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet.

task.description: The catacombs are located on the outskirts of the city. Take the eastern road and follow it until you reach the entrance.
Once you are in the catacombs, search for a hidden chamber. The scroll is hidden within.
Once you have the scroll, return to Archmage Elminster at the temple. He will reward you for your efforts.
